Simulator.Name: PhStirring
Simulator.Description: Simulation data of a pH neutralization process in a constant volume stirring tank. Volume of the tank 1100 liters Concentration of the acid solution (HAC) 0.0032 Mol/l Concentration of the base solution (NaOH) 0,05 Mol/l http://homes.esat.kuleuven.be/~smc/daisy/daisydata.html Data scaled with: 8 12 0 2
